code: export function loadTweets(callback){const xhr=new XMLHttpRequest();const method='GET';const url="http://127.0.0.1:8000/api/tweet/";const responseType="json";xhr.responseType=responseType;xhr.open(method,url);xhr.onload=function(){callback(xhr.response,xhr.status);};xhr.onerror=function(e){callback({"message":"The request was an error."},400);};xhr.send();}
